languages.text: "Однако слово Лорд-капитана на этом корабле сильнее залпа сотни болтеров. Я уверена, что если Вольный Торговец лично обратится к недовольным — это усмирит волнения".

"But on this ship, the word of the Lord Captain carries more weight than a salvo from a hundred bolters. I'm sure that if the Rogue Trader addresses the malcontents directly, {mf|he|she} will quell the unrest."
languages.original_text: "Однако слово Лорд-капитана на этом корабле сильнее залпа сотни болтеров. Я уверена, что если Вольный Торговец лично обратится к недовольным — это усмирит волнения".

traits.locale_text: "But on this ship, the word of the Lord Captain carries more weight than a salvo from a hundred bolters. I'm sure that if the Rogue Trader addresses the malcontents directly, {mf|he|she} will quell the unrest."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

traits.locale_text: "But on this ship, the word of the Lord Captain carries more weight than a salvo from a hundred bolters. I'm sure that if the Rogue Trader addresses the malcontents directly, {mf|he|she} will quell the unrest."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

traits.locale_text: "But on this ship, the word of the Lord Captain carries more weight than a salvo from a hundred bolters. I'm sure that if the Rogue Trader addresses the malcontents directly, {mf|he|she} will quell the unrest."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

traits.locale_text: "But on this ship, the word of the Lord Captain carries more weight than a salvo from a hundred bolters. I'm sure that if the Rogue Trader addresses the malcontents directly, {mf|he|she} will quell the unrest."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: “但在这艘船上，舰长大人的话比一百把爆矢枪的齐射更有分量。我相信，如果行商浪人愿意与这些心怀不满的民众对话，动乱会直接平息。”
languages.original_text: "But on this ship, the word of the Lord Captain carries more weight than a salvo from a hundred bolters. I'm sure that if the Rogue Trader addresses the malcontents directly, {mf|he|she} will quell the unrest."

traits.locale_text: “但在这艘船上，舰长大人的话比一百把爆矢枪的齐射更有分量。我相信，如果行商浪人愿意与这些心怀不满的民众对话，动乱会直接平息。”
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: «Sin embargo, en esta nave, la palabra de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente tiene más peso que la descarga de cien bólters. No me cabe duda de que si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se dirige personalmente a los insatisfechos, acallará su furia».
languages.original_text: "But on this ship, the word of the Lord Captain carries more weight than a salvo from a hundred bolters. I'm sure that if the Rogue Trader addresses the malcontents directly, {mf|he|she} will quell the unrest."

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, en esta nave, la palabra de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente tiene más peso que la descarga de cien bólters. No me cabe duda de que si {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se dirige personalmente a los insatisfechos, acallará su furia».
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: 「しかし、この船では、ロード・キャプテンの言葉は百発百中のボルターよりも重みがあるものです。自由開拓者が不満分子を直接説得すれば、動揺を鎮めると確信しております」
languages.original_text: "But on this ship, the word of the Lord Captain carries more weight than a salvo from a hundred bolters. I'm sure that if the Rogue Trader addresses the malcontents directly, {mf|he|she} will quell the unrest."

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、この船では、ロード・キャプテンの言葉は百発百中のボルターよりも重みがあるものです。自由開拓者が不満分子を直接説得すれば、動揺を鎮めると確信しております」
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "Doch auf diesem Schiff hat das Wort des Lord Captains mehr Gewicht als eine Salve aus einhundert Boltern. Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} persönlich mit den Unzufriedenen spricht, kann {mf|er|sie} die Unruhen gewiss stillen."
languages.original_text: "But on this ship, the word of the Lord Captain carries more weight than a salvo from a hundred bolters. I'm sure that if the Rogue Trader addresses the malcontents directly, {mf|he|she} will quell the unrest."

traits.locale_text: "Doch auf diesem Schiff hat das Wort des Lord Captains mehr Gewicht als eine Salve aus einhundert Boltern. Wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} persönlich mit den Unzufriedenen spricht, kann {mf|er|sie} die Unruhen gewiss stillen."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: « Pour autant, à bord de ce vaisseau, la parole {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} a plus de poids que cent bolters ouvrant le feu simultanément. Nul doute qu'en vous adressant directement aux mécontents, vous réussirez à calmer le jeu. »
languages.original_text: "But on this ship, the word of the Lord Captain carries more weight than a salvo from a hundred bolters. I'm sure that if the Rogue Trader addresses the malcontents directly, {mf|he|she} will quell the unrest."

traits.locale_text: « Pour autant, à bord de ce vaisseau, la parole {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} a plus de poids que cent bolters ouvrant le feu simultanément. Nul doute qu'en vous adressant directement aux mécontents, vous réussirez à calmer le jeu. »
traits.speaker: GuardLeader

languages.text: "Fakat bu gemide Lord Kaptan'ın sözü, yüz bulonatarın mermisinden daha ağır gelir. Hür Tacir bu nankörlere doğrudan hitap ederse şüphesiz ki isyanı bastıracaktır."
languages.original_text: "But on this ship, the word of the Lord Captain carries more weight than a salvo from a hundred bolters. I'm sure that if the Rogue Trader addresses the malcontents directly, {mf|he|she} will quell the unrest."

traits.locale_text: "Fakat bu gemide Lord Kaptan'ın sözü, yüz bulon silahının mermisinden daha ağır gelir. Hür Tacir bu nankörlere doğrudan hitap ederse isyanı bastıracaktır, şüphesiz."
traits.speaker: GuardLeader
